tool_description: Optimizes session timing based on lighting conditions, weather, location constraints, and client availability to determine the best shooting schedule.

available_dates.description: Potential session dates in YYYY-MM-DD format

preferred_times.description: Preferred time slots: morning, midday, afternoon, golden-hour, blue-hour, evening

lighting_preference.description: Preferred lighting: natural, artificial, mixed, or golden-hour

weather_dependency.description: Weather sensitivity: high, medium, or low

error_messages: Invalid date format: Dates must be in YYYY-MM-DD format
Invalid time preferences: Must be from [morning, midday, afternoon, golden-hour, blue-hour, evening]
Invalid session duration: Must be between 0.5 and 8 hours
Invalid lighting preference: Must be one of [natural, artificial, mixed, golden-hour]
Invalid weather dependency: Must be 'high', 'medium', or 'low'
usage: Provide available dates, preferred times, session duration, and lighting preferences. The tool returns optimized scheduling recommendations with timing rationale.

recommended_datetime.description: Best recommended session date and time

alternative_times.description: Alternative session times ranked by suitability

lighting_quality_score.description: Expected lighting quality score (0-100) for recommended time

scheduling_summary.description: Explanation of scheduling recommendation and factors considered
